description.activeText: AlarmPresent1:Emergency Stop, Low oil pressure, High coolant temperature, Low coolant temperature Alarms Present
description.inactiveText: AlarmPresent1:Emergency Stop, Low oil pressure, High coolant temperature, Low coolant temperature Alarms Cleared

description.activeText: AlarmPresent2:Under speed, Over speed, Generator Under Frequency, Generator Under Frequency, Generator Over Frequency Alarms Present
description.inactiveText: AlarmPresent2:Under speed, Over speed, Generator Under Frequency, Generator Under Frequency, Generator Over Frequency Alarms Cleared

description.activeText: AlarmPresent3:Generator low voltage, Generator high voltage, Battery low voltage, Battery high voltage Alarms Present
description.inactiveText: AlarmPresent3:Generator low voltage, Generator high voltage, Battery low voltage, Battery high voltage Alarms Cleared

description.activeText: AlarmPresent4:Charge alternator failure, Fail to start, Fail to stop, Generator fail to close Alarms Present
description.inactiveText: AlarmPresent4:Charge alternator failure, Fail to start, Fail to stop, Generator fail to close Alarms Cleared

description.activeText: AlarmPresent5:Mins fail to close, Oil pressure sender, Loss of magnetic pick up, Magnetic pick up open circuit Alarms Present
description.inactiveText: AlarmPresent5:Mins fail to close, Oil pressure sender, Loss of magnetic pick up, Magnetic pick up open circuit Alarms Cleared

description.activeText: AlarmPresent6:Generator high current, Calibration lost, Low fuel level, CAN ECU Warning Alarms Present
description.inactiveText: AlarmPresent6:Generator high current, Calibration lost, Low fuel level, CAN ECU Warning Alarms Cleared
